## Events

| Event            | Description                                 | Type               |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `idpUrlSelected` | Emits the selected IDP URL to use for login | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `pod-os:error`   |                                             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
